text: The Saint is a 1997 American action romance movie directed by Phillip Noyce and starring Val Kilmer, Elisabeth Shue, Rade Šerbedžija, Valery Nikolaev, Alun Armstrong, Henry Goodman, Yevgeni Lazarev, Irina Apeksimova, Lev Prygunov, Charlotte Cronwell. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures and was based on the 1960's British television programme of the same name. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1997 action movies Category:1997 romance movies Category:1990s American action movies Category:1990s American romance movies Category:Movies directed by Phillip Noyce Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies based on TV series Category:Movies set in Russia
title: The Saint (1997 movie)
